title: Tech News: Twitter and Facebook Shut Down Pro-US Propaganda Campaign
itunes:title: Tech News: Twitter and Facebook Shut Down Pro-US Propaganda Campaign
description:
Facebook and Twitter have been shutting down fake accounts spreading pro-US narratives in the Middle East and Asia. Google warns us of a hacking tool that can download your entire email inbox. And in most of the world it's about to get more expensive to buy a new PS5.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Facebook and Twitter have been shutting down fake accounts spreading pro-US narratives in the Middle East and Asia. Google warns us of a hacking tool that can download your entire email inbox. And in most of the world it's about to get more expensive to buy a new PS5.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: Facebook, Twitter, propaganda, China, supply chain, Apple, Honda, Mazda, electric vehicles, EVs, hydrogen, fuel cell, trains, Google, email, Sony, PlayStation 5, PS5, FN Meka, rap, Capitol Music Group, metaverse, artificial intelligence, Match Group, Tinder, Apple Wallet, NFC
